ns5:member.ns1:desc: Network Signalling value NS_01 according to TS 36.101, Table 6.2.4-1. This literal value corresponds to no additional spectrum emission requirements.

Network Signalling value NS_03 according to TS 36.101, Table 6.2.4-1. This literal value corresponds to additional spectrum emission requirements on E-UTRA bands 2, 4, 10, 35 and 36 with channel bandwidths 3, 5, 10, 15 and 20 MHz.
Network Signalling value NS_04 according to TS 36.101, Table 6.2.4-1.

Network Signalling value NS_05 according to TS 36.101, Table 6.2.4-1. This literal value corresponds to additional spectrum emission requirements on E-UTRA band 1 with channel bandwidths 10, 15 and 20 MHz.
Network Signalling value NS_07 according to TS 36.101, Table 6.2.4-1. This literal value corresponds to additional spectrum emission requirements on E-UTRA band 13 with channel bandwidth 10 MHz.
